display_long_description:
# Master Faster Your Guitar in Mixed Reality!

Learn guitar and bass with IMMERROCK, the mixed reality app that makes guitar learning fun, intuitive, and easier than ever. Get instant feedback, access to +300 bite-sized gamified exercises, and play your first song in minutes.
[media]

# **GUIDED BITE-SIZED GAMIFIED EXERCISES**
Whether you've got 1 hour or 10 minutes, our lessons and exercises are designed to fit into your busy day, making daily practice effective.
[media]

# **YOUR CLEAR PATH TO MASTER GUITAR**
Stop getting stuck on the same chords. With 300+ progressive exercises, you’ll level up your guitar skills step by step. From your first notes to your first song in minutes.
[media]

# **PRACTICE AT YOUR OWN PACE**
Adjust speed, loop song sections, or go at your own pace with Wait Mode.
[media]

# **EASY TO FOLLOW FINGER-PLACEMENT**
Clear finger placement guidance helps you lock in on your guitar, fingers, and flow.
[media]


Additional Features

🎵 Custom Songs: Convert your favorite tracks with Editor on Fire

🎸Diverse Play Modes: Practice Mode or Master Mode.

🧠Learn Faster, Retain Longer: Build real muscle memory that transfers outside Mixed Reality.


Join our Discord: https://www.discord.gg/SP4tumnEx6


**Note Detection Setup**

Requires you connect your guitar in one of several ways:

-1/4" TS to USB-C (with headphones)

-Real Tone cable + USB-C adapter

-Mini amp such as Boss Katana: GoB or Fender Mustang Micro Plus
